context.description: This dialog allows you to select a file in the workspace.
On this page, you can configure External Tool preferences.
On this page, you can configure the External Tool builders that are run when this project is built.
This tab allows you to configure when this project builder will be executed.
This tab allows you to configure the program location and other attributes of this launch configuration.
This configuration type allows you to run a program from your local computer
This tab allows you to configure what resources, if any, are built prior to the tool being launched
This tab allows you to choose which resources are refreshed when a launch configuration is executed.
This tab allows you to create and configure the environment variables that will be passed into the launch configuration when the program is executed
This tab allows you to set if the launch configuration is shared, which favorites menu it will be displayed in, output and encoding options and whether to launch the configuration in the background.
